PLATEAU Workshop
Bringing together Programming Languages and Human-Computer Interaction
Home Prior Year Sites

PLATEAU2024
14th annual workshop on the intersection of HCI and PL
@ University of California, Berkeley, CA USA February 19-20, 2024

PLATEAU will take place on the University of California, Berkeley campus in Berkeley, CA from February 19-20, 2024. Further details on location and registration are TBD.

Important Dates
Wednesday, December 6th, 2023 (AoE time)

February 19-20, 2024
